lead_paragraph: Mercedes have been approached by half the Formula One grid since world champion Nico Rosberg announced his retirement on Friday, according to the team's non-executive chairman Niki Lauda.

headline.print_headline: Half F1 Grid Is After Rosberg's Seat, Says Lauda
headline.main: Half F1 Grid Is After Rosberg's Seat, Says Lauda

snippet: Mercedes have been approached by half the Formula One grid since world champion Nico Rosberg announced his retirement on Friday, according to the team's non-executive chairman Niki Lauda....
